headline: KKR (KKR): Evaluating Valuation After a Fresh Share Price Rebound
summary: KKR (KKR) has been quietly grinding higher, with the stock up around 4% in the past day and roughly 7% over the past week, even as one year returns remain negative. See our latest analysis for KKR. That recent 1 month share price return of just over 13% looks more like a momentum reset than a blip, especially given the weaker year to date share price performance and still impressive multiyear total shareholder returns. If KKR’s rebound has you thinking about where capital might compound next,...
